NOW

YOU

NOW
GOD

14431111111.content:
Eric and Ryan finally arrived at the house where the big anniversary pool party was supposed to take place along with their friends Douglas, Denise, Lucy, Jessica, and Melissa. They only had their bathing suits on, which Eric would remove as soon as he had the chance.

Eric walked around the living room where he spotted a large full body mirror, stopping and flexing a bit first. His biceps were large and round like soccer balls. But, he wasn’t happy about his legs and his torso so he silently ordered his body to grow a bit more.

His torso widened a few inches more as his shoulders widened considerably. His huge lats stuck out like mighty wings as his upper body stretched outwards and sideways. His pecs pushed outwards some more while his quads filled out some more, becoming even larger than the biggest oak trees. Not to mention his calves which were totally mind blowing since they were as big and as round as melons while covered with veins!

Just then Ryan walked by, doing a double take as he noticed his bigger, divine friend standing there.

“Holy crap, dude! Did you just make yourself bigger?” Ryan gasped as he examined his pal’s body from head to toe.

“Yeah! So, how do I look?” Eric grinned, posing as he was showing off his huge, super-muscular body to his best friend.

“Dude! You’re the biggest teen on the planet!” Ryan shouted, as he ran his hand over Eric’s large abdominal muscles. Not only were his muscles impressive, but Eric was now standing at an impressive 6-foot-9 inches tall!

“Hey! I’m God! I gotta look the part, bro! I gotta look…. Godly!” Eric smiled, as he flexed his huge python-arms one more time before he turned around and walked out to where the pool was located in the backyard patio.

About two-dozen people were mingling outside, hovering around the small bar and the table near the BBQ grill as the teenage God strolled around to the pool.

“First, this is a pool party, so I think it was time to go for a swim!” he grinned as he squatted down and passed his hand through the water. “Hmm… A little on the cold side. How about we warm it up a little?”

Eric stood up and waved his hand over the water, raising the water temperature in an instant. Heat was coming off the water as he dove in, swimming a bit underwater before coming to the surface.

“Ryan! Get in! The water is nice and warm now!” Eric shouted from the center of the pool.

“Uhh… Sure, bro…” Ryan hesitated as he glanced over at the girls.

“Uhhmm… The water looks cold!” Jessica sneered.

“The water IS cold!” Melissa grumbled.

“It is NOT!” Eric shouted. “I don’t wanna be the only guy swimming in the pool! No freaking way! Everybody in the air!”

Suddenly, every single person at the party started to float about 3 feet above the ground!

“EEEK! What’s happening?”

“HOLY SHIT!”

“I’m FLOATING!!!”

“NO WAY!!”

“PUT ME DOWN!!!”

Eric waved his hand over the air.

“Everybody float above the pool!” he commanded.

At his divine command, the two-dozen people slowly drifted over the pool like human balloons!

“AAAAHHH! PUT ME DOWN!”

“THIS IS IMPOSSIBLE! WHO IS DOING THIS??”

“THIS IS MAGIC!!!”

“Now, everybody drop in the water!” Eric ordered.

PLUNGE!!

About 25 people hit the water in the pool with one big, loud plunge as Eric looked on from the side edge of the pool. He just chuckled as he caused all these people to fall in the water thanks to his powers!

“Isn’t the water nice now?” he giggled as Ryan swam up to him.

“Slick move there, Lord Eric!” Ryan growled, splashing water all over the teenage God. “Very slick move!”

“You wanted a pool party…. So, welcome to the pool! I don’t want to be the only guy swimming in here!” Eric laughed.

“You took care of THAT! Now EVERYBODY’s swimming in the pool, thanks to YOU!” Ryan sighed.

“Hey, I make sure I make an impact when I show up at a party!” Eric shrugged. “Plus, the water is nice and warm now, so…”

Eric waved his hand again and everyone in the pool was butt NAKED!

“WHOA!” Ryan gasped

“Enjoy it, dude! Show off those big muscles!” Eric smiled.

“Speak for yourself!” Ryan smiled, swimming over to the big, naked teenage God who had a large, muscular body to show off himself.

“Let’s go get some steaks and chicken wings from the BBQ…” Eric smiled as he climbed out of the pool and wandered over to the BBQ grill and grabbed a plate with a napkin. Everybody else was enjoying the party while Eric and Ryan were already contemplating what they would do next…

144311111112.content:
Eric and his friends were sitting at the usual table when one of their classmates came up to them.

"Yo E. You comin' to Tommi Anderson's party on Saturday?"

"I dunno. Jess?? You in the mood?"

"Tommi always has great parties. What about you Mel?"

"Any opportunity to go shopping sounds good to me."

"Did I mention it was a costume party?"

"Like I said before, any excuse to shop sounds good."

"I swear Melissa, the best thing your father ever did for you was give you those platinum cards when you turned 16."

"Damn right, bitch. But don't you be playing Miss High and Mighty with me Jess! Your dad might be a world champion power lifter but I've seen his knees BUCKLE when he looked at your credit card statement!!"

"So...you girls wanna go to the party or not?"

"Yes!!!" they said in unison.

Ryan snorted.

"Guess that answers that. Marcus, let Tommi know we'll be there."

"Yeah. See you guys then."

After school that day...

"I just had a great idea."

"What's up?"

"What if we did couples costumes. SUPERHERO couples."

"Ok...what did you have in mind?"

"Me and Jess will go as Superman and Wonder Woman and Ryan, you and Mel can go as Batman and Catwoman??"

"No way!! Why should you and Jess have super powered characters and we don't?"

"Ok...what about Mel, you go as Power Girl.-"

"Sounds good."

"And Ryan, I dunno, Ultraman??"

"So what, now I'm a robot??"

Eric rolled his eyes.

"Not the Japanese Ultraman. The DC version."

"There's another Ultra Man??"

"Yes. The DC Ultra Man is an evil version of Superman from another Earth."

"So I'm supposed to be your evil doppelganger??"

"Well, yes and no. The one big difference is kryptonite makes him stronger instead of weaker."

"Nice! So what about the costumes?"

"I'll wear the traditional blue and I was thinking you wear black. How about that?"

"The black with the blue trim? I love that one!! Let's do it!!"

Eric grinned as they entered the store. It didn't take long for them to find the exact costumes they needed and they paid the owner's wife extra to have them ready for the next day. They all decided to meet by Eric's house so they could go together. Instead of taking Jessica's red Mustang convertible, Eric persuaded them to walk instead. When the others asked why, Eric just smiled mysteriously. The party was incredible and everyone was talking and eating and havimg a wonderful time. Around minutes to 11, Jessica began squirming uncomfortably.

"Eric. We DID give those people at the store the right sizes didn't we?"

"Pretty sure we did. Why??"

"My costume's feeling awfully tight all of a sudden!"

"Yeah?? What were you eating?"

"Nothing major. I had like two diet Cokes and a couple handfuls of popcorn. Melissa and I are competing in a fitness competition in a week or so. No pigging out until then."

"I don't know what to tell you. Allergic reaction maybe?'

A few minutes later, Ryan and Melissa came over with the same complaint. Again, Eric feigned ignorance but grinned almost sinisterly. Not too long after, the grandfather clock in the hallway began to chime midnight. Jessica, Ryan and Melissa groaned in pain and Eric suggested they all go outside to get some fresh air. As soon as the clock stopped chiming, they all suddenly felt better again. Melissa was the first to speak.

"What was THAT all about??"

"Do you REALLY want to know?

"YOU know?"

"I do."

"So why the fuck didn't you tell us inside???"

"BECAUSE...I didn't want to spoil the surprise."

"Surprise?? What surprise??"

"The three of you go look in the mirror on the patio."

Jessica, Ryan and Melissa walked over to the mirror and gasped. Instead of their normally athletically built frames they now looked like insanely buff, hyper shredded bodybuilders! They were so huge that their costumes had been stretched almost to the bursting point.

"Oh my god!! Eric!! Did you have something to do with this??"

"I may have. But that is only the tip of the iceberg."

"There's more??"

"Remember how I suggested that we choose superhero couples costumes?? Well I should've put the emphasis on the SUPERHERO part."

"You're kidding right?"

"Try concentrating on flying."

The trio did and in no time their geet were several inches above the ground.

"Oh my god!! Eric!! Are you saying I have all of Wonder Woman's powers?"

"No. You have all of her powers to the hundredth power."

"Dude. What about me and Mel? "

"What do you mean what about you all?? You thought that convo outside the costume store was just for fun??"

"Well...yeah. I thought you were just yanking my chain."

"No bro. Both you and Melissa, faster than a speeding bullet, more powerful than a locomotive, able to leap tall buildings in a single bound, and so on and so on."

"Awesome."

"This is also why I didn't want us to take Jessica's Mustang to the party. Because that would've meant one of us would have to come back and get the car."

"So there IS a method to your madness??"

"Absolutely. Let's go home."

Jessica, Ryan and Melissa began rising higher into the sky when they noticed Eric was still on the ground.

"Aren't you coming??"

"You guys go ahead. There's something I gotta take care of first."

Tristan took off and he arrived 3 seconds later. By the time Eric took off and flew over there, Tristan was waiting for him by the front door.

“What took you so long, Eric?” Tristan asked him.

“I’m not as fast as you, Flash!” Eric grinned, as the two boys went inside and enjoyed the party.

The boys walked around and enjoyed some snacks and soda before the flew and ran back to Eric’s house, where the two joined with the other three superheroes.

A short, overweight boy was sitting on a bench in the school’s courtyard, enjoying a box of crackers all by himself when Eric, Ryan and Jessica approached him. The boy suddenly had a horrified look on his face, especially when he saw Ryan and Eric, who were completely naked, showing off their glorified, muscular bodies.

The boy just uttered “Ohhh No….” and grabbed his crackers and his backpack, got up, and started walking away, just as the threesome arrived.

“Hey! You don’t have to leave! HEY! STOP! I want you to STOP!” Ryan shouted.

But, he kept on walking.

“Stop right there, dude!” Eric said calmly.

The boy suddenly stopped right in his tracks. He HAD to obey Eric’s commands.

“Come back…”

The boy turned around and walked back to the bench where the threesome was waiting.

“I-I... I don’t know how you made me walk back over here…” he uttered. “P-p-please don’t hurt me…”

“We’re not gonna hurt you!” Ryan began.

“Sit down, Josh…” Eric said calmly.

“How did you know my name?” the chubby boy asked.

“There’s a small name tag on your bag with your name printed on it…” Eric explained.

“Oh…” Josh said, looking down and noticing the name tag. “Why are you guys even talking to me? You guys are so big and buff! You look like… GODS!”

That remark made Ryan and Eric chuckle for a moment.

“There’s no need to be afraid of us, dude!” Ryan grinned. “Oh, can I have a cracker from you?”

“OH! Is that what you want? My crackers? Here! Have the whole box! It’s almost empty. Anyway!” Josh shouted as he handed the box to Ryan. He took a cracker and handed the box to Eric.

“Empty? What are you talking about? The box is full!” Eric smiled as he took one cracker and handed the box back to Josh.

“Oh come on! The box is…” Josh grumbled as he took the box and looked through the opening at the top, just to notice that it was filled all the way to the top with good, fresh crackers! “WHAAH!”

Josh’s jaw dropped wide open. He took five crackers and stuffed them in his mouth before he stared at the three students standing before them.

“What the heck? Is this a magic trick? How… How did you do that?” he stuttered.

“Easy…” Eric said calmly. “I’m God!”

Josh just stared at him in silence.

“Give me a break!”

“Fine! All your clothes will vanish!” Eric said casually.

“What?”

In a blink of an eye, Josh’s jeans, his shirt, his socks and his shoes all disappeared, leaving him standing there, on the courtyard, completely naked. Josh had thick, chubby legs with a big, round belly and short, chubby arms and of course his chest was all covered in layers of fat.

“AAAHH! WHAT THE HELL?” he screamed.

“Now, Josh, I can fix you up completely! Do you want that?” Eric grinned.

“Y-y-yes… “Josh stuttered, feeling scared, ashamed, embarrassed and hurt that he was standing completely naked in the courtyard at school for all to see, showing his disgusting, overweight body with rolls of fat everywhere.

“First, let’s have all that fat melt away from your body, shall we?” Eric grinned, waving his hand at Josh.

Instantly, Josh felt all the blubber from his legs, his arms, his chest, and his belly rapidly deflate as his skin became harder and his entire body practically dwindled down in size. He didn’t become shorter, rather, all the fat just disappeared from his limbs and torso until he looked like a normal, lean, teenage boy again. It was like he felt over 30 pounds of weight just disappear from his body in an instant!

“WHOA! Ohmygosh… I SHRUNK! I mean… I’m THIN! I’m freaking SKINNY!” Josh gasped, looking down at his thin arms, legs and lean torso. He was so thin; you could see the outline of his ribs on his stomach! “ALL MY FAT IS GONE!”

Eric just folded his arms and glanced at him.

“Yeah, but there is just no way I’m gonna leave you looking like THAT!” he chuckled.

“Yeah, he looks so… Ordinary…” Ryan sighed.

“Yup. Time to pack on the muscle!” Eric smiled. “LOTS of it!”

“Hold up… Have him join a sports team, you know? That way, he stays in shape!” Ryan suggested.

“Oh, good point!” Eric cheered. “And all the guys he talks to, will become his teammates!”

Then, Eric turned towards Josh, who was still lean and naked.

“OK Josh, I’m gonna make you and your friends into jocks from now on… “Eric said. “You’re gonna become…”

14431111212.content:
Sitting on a bench with her binder on her lap was a girl that they guessed to be 12 or 13 years old. Since classes were still in session it was odd for her to be there. Jessica went over to find out what was wrong.

“Hi, are you alright?”

When the girl saw who was talking to her, she gasped and began to run away.

“Wait! Where are you going?? I want to talk to you!!”

The girl stopped in her tracks and turned around.

“Y-you want to talk to ME??”

“Yeah I do. Why wouldn't I?”

“Because you're the goddess!”

“Say what??”

“That's what they call you in the lower school. You're Jessica Abrams, the goddess, the perfect 10. We're not even supposed to speak to you!!”

By this time Eric and Ryan had walked up to the girls. Eric had had the decency to put on jeans and a t-shirt by then. They had overheard the conversation.

“Jess!! What have you been telling those freshmen??”

“Me?? I never told them anything!!”

“Oh my god!! Eric Stevens AND Ryan Matthews!! Maryann will never believe this!!”
“Who's Maryann??”

“My best friend.”

“Ok. Well right now, you have us at a disadvantage. You know all of our names but we don't know your's”

“I'm Meredith. Meredith Baxter.”

“Ok Meredith. Pleased to meet you. NOW, let's get back to that whole “goddess” thing now??”

“The kids in my grade call you that because you're the most popular girl in school. Tall, perfect hair, perfect body, perfect boobs. I heard one boy say that he heard you're Wonder Woman's little sister.”

“Oh my god....”

Eric and Ryan were on the verge of howling. Jessica looked at them and at Meredith's almost beet-red face.

“Meredith. None of that is true! I am not some goddess or some fairy princess or whatever those perverted little boys have been saying. I am just a normal girl just like everyone else. I get pimples. I worry about my weight and I don't wake up with my hair looking like this. Got it??”

“Yes ma'am.”

“Don't call me ma'am!! You make me sound old!!”

“Okay.”

“Now. Want to tell us why you were sitting on the bench earlier?”

Meredith's face turned red again.

“I wasn't feeling well so I was waiting for my mom to pick me up.”

“I bet I can guess why you were sick.”

“You can?”

“Yup, my guess is that the other girls had begun developing over the summer and you didn't. So you were embarrassed and pretended to be sick to go to the nurse.”

“How did you know that!!”

“Because.....4 years ago I was sitting on that very same bench waiting for my mom.”

“No way!!!”

“Yup. And what made it worse was, before my mom met my dad, she used to work as an exotic dancer. And HER boobs were ginormous. AND natural.”

“I don't believe that! You're just saying that to make me feel better!”

“I'm not lying. Eric? Ryan?”

The boys shooks their heads.

“It's true. Her mom's boobs were huge. They still are.”

“Wow...but how does that help me?? You inherited your boobs!!”

“Yes I did. But my mom taught me a secret on how to get big boobs. It was passed down from generation to generation in my family. And I'll teach it to you.”

“You will??”

“Sure. Come here and I'll tell you how.”

Meredith walked over to Jessica with a look of excitement on her face. Jessica knelt down next to the girl and said

“The secret is you do...”

“Yeah???”

“Absolutely nothing.”

Meredith looked at Jessica with hurt in her eyes, which were filling up with tears.

“I knew it!! I knew you were just making fun of me!!”

“No Meredith. I swear I wasn't!! What I meant it isn't something you can go buy or anything like that. The secret is literally inside of you and involves a process to bring it out.”

“Seriously?”

“I swear to god. As stupid and cliché as this may sound, the process involves eating properly and getting lots of exercise. And not just a little jogging or anything. I mean working up a good sweat. Making your muscles burn. And most important of all. Getting enough sleep. Wanna know why that is important?”

“Why??”

“Because it's when you're asleep that your body GROWS. Especially these.” Jessica replied, placing Meredith's hand on her prodigious chest.

“Okay. Thanks Jessica.”

“You're more than welcome....”

Just then a thought crossed Jessica's mind.

“Hey Meredith.”

“Yeah??”

“Your classmates call me the goddess right??”

“Yeah, but I'm going to set them straight tomorrow!”

“I don't want you to anymore.”

“You don't?? Why not??”

“Because YOU'RE gonna be my goddess in training.”

“I am!!!”

“Yes you are. In fact, call Maryann and one other girl and tell them the “goddess” wants to meet with them after school tomorrow, ok??”

“OK!!!”

Meredith then dashed off to find her friends. As she left, Eric looked at Jessica strangely.

“Jess?? What are you planning??”

Jessica's just arched her eyebrow and smirked.

“You'll see....”

"Thank you my lord, I shall play to my upmost greatest ability" replied to inferior insect of a brother.
"Now, it's time to prove to this world who the alpha being is" the child of mass infinite power announced.
The day contuined, Arnold repaired the room with his godly powers and was currently watching television. His brother was tirelessly working out listening to God's command. Suddenly, someone is heard coming upstairs.

152121111.content:
Arnold's mom was walking upstairs, she open to check up on his little man, but as soon as she opened the door, the feeling of being completely overshadowment and weakness insignificance filled her body. Before her eyes was the living embodiment of God, the form of sheer power and dominance was before her eyes, she knew that this being before her was the almighty lord, but it was also her son?!
"Arnold?! Wh-what has...why hav...who...what are you?" She said in utter overwhelming fear.
"Hello mother, I am god." Arnold spoke. His mere stature while small, completely dominated was felt like the whole world. She was in utter awe of this muscular supreme being that could instant give her a punishment worse than a trillion hells with a simple thought, the immensity of his power left her in complete shock. She was soon overwhelmed by this power and fainted, Arnold then proceeded to levitate her body to the bed mattress where he was sitting. He then recreated it into a throne fit for the gods. She then awoke, Arnold merely stared down at her like a pet, and began to stroke her hair. She was rejoiced with happiness, god has spared her and given her bliss, she looked up at his starue in fear and awe as he contuine to pet her like a doll.
152121111.title: Mom

1521211111.content:
Arnold stares down at his pet, he then proceeds to speak.
"Mother, as god, addressing you as mother makes me seem inferior, I am the upmost superior to any being in the universe, I shall address you as your first name, Linda." He explained
"Now Linda, proceed to fetch me some food, I could create it myself in an instant but towering over you gives me pleasure." He told her with complete booming authority. She was teleported to a high end restaurant with immensely high prices. She gets in line to order when the people in front of her suddenly vanish, it must be God's work she concludes. She proceeds to order food but finds herself short on money, she realizes that money, law and order mean nothing to her as her son is now god.
" I demand the finest of meals for my son, who is now God of this universe, please hurry immediately" she tells the cashier. He belives this to be a joke and merely laughs at the lady. Suddenly, a voice from the heavens shakes the entire building from above, the customers and employees are shaken with fear.
"Hear my word you pitiful beings, I am god, I rule upon this world, if I want something I get it, if I don't want something, it doesn't happen and there's no force in the universe that can change that." Suddenly the room begins shaking violently, the roof of the building is being torn off by a gigantic human hand, the hand of god! The people begin to coward, small children running for their parents, everyone is in an uproar, a shining light appears from the sky.
1521211111.title: He slowly becomes crazed with power

choices: "I want to make you into a giant and then I want to shrink you!"
"I want to change you into a gymnast, a wrestler or a swimmer!"

152122.content:
“Yo, Arnold… What happened to the door, dude? Did it break off?”

Arnold turned around and breathed a deep sigh of relief when he saw Luke, his classmate from school standing at the top of the stairs to the basement, admiring the broken door.

“Come down here, Luke!” Arnold smiled. He was happy that Luke had showed up. Now he could show and test his powers on someone.

Luke was about the same height as Arnold and the same age, so 10 years old, but maybe 2 inches taller and skinny as a rail. Luke was dressed in red shorts, socks and a soccer jersey with cleats on since he had just come from soccer practice. He had the word “Warriors” printed on his red jersey.

“What are you doing down here? Lifting your brother’s weights? You know he hates… Oh!” Luke gasped when he had a better view of Arnold’s physique, which was stunning! “Holy crap! Where did all those muscles come from, dude?”

“Well…” Arnold sighed as he walked closer to his friend. “I just became God!” he said calmly.

Luke just glared at him for a moment, not knowing how to react. What did he say?

“You’re kidding!”

“No, I’m serious! I can do stuff just by thinking it! Watch!” Arnold said as he waved his hand before his friend, who was standing just a few feet in front of him.

Suddenly, there was a bright flash of light that blinded Luke, and when it disappeared, all of Luke’s clothes were gone. His soccer uniform was now neatly laid out on the bench press while Luke was standing in the basement, butt naked.

“AHH! ARNOLD! What the heck?”

“No worries, dude! I know what you look like!” Arnold grinned. “Now, let’s give you some muscle, just like mine!”

Arnold waved his hand again, and Luke was overcome with a powerful tingling all over his body, specifically in his muscles.

Then, every muscle in the skinny boy’s body started to inflate! His chest pushed outward and sideways as his pecs bulged, his biceps and triceps exploded in his arms, his abdominal muscles popped up on his flat stomach and his quads and calves suddenly widened and thickened in a matter of seconds, inflating into large mounds of rock-hard muscle on the boy’s body! And this was all happening, all at once!

“Holy shit!” Luke gasped out loud when the growth stopped. “I’m a total muscle guy!” he exclaimed as he flexed and admired his new, muscular body.

“Now, let’s put you in your soccer gear that fits your new body!” Arnold grinned, waving his hand again.

In a bright flash of light, Luke was wearing his adjusted soccer kit, made to fit his big, muscular body!

“So, do you like it?” Arnold grinned, as he folded his arms.

“Ohmygosh! This is… awesome! I mean… What else can you do?” Luke asked him.

“Anything, bro! I can do anything!” Arnold replied. “I still need to practice how to use my powers some more, though… So, I might use you to test my God-powers on, okay?”

“Ohh… What do you want to do?” Luke asked him.

“Well…” Arnold though….

"What? Where? What are you gonna do to me?" Luke sighed nervously.

Before Arnold snapped his fingers, which changed Luke's clothes and teleported him away, he explained his plan to his friend.

15213.content:
Arnold was standing before the large mirror, admiring his reflection as a VERY muscular boy when he heard some noises coming from outside. His window was open, so he was curious about the sounds. He wandered over to window like a bodybuilder, with his thick arms hanging from his sides due to his wide shoulders and his large, thick, python arms.

As soon as he arrived at the window, he spotted a young couple walking outside. A man and a woman were walking on the sidewalk. They were no older than 25 years or so. They were thin and athletic, but not so muscular.

“Look at them…” Arnold grinned. “They would look much nicer if they were bodybuilders with over 200 pounds of muscle added to their bodies!” he thought to himself.

Then, something magical happened to them just as Arnold turned around to sit on the living room couch.

The man and the woman were hit with Arnold’s godly powers as his desires needed to be fulfilled since he was God! So, right away, their muscles cramped up, forcing them to stop walking for a minute as they started to GROW!

Both the man and the woman groaned and moaned loudly as their chests expanded, their arms bulged with muscle, and their stomachs suddenly formed mighty abdominal muscles. Then, their quads inflated with mighty cords of muscle above the knees as their calves grew into muscles as large as soccer balls at the back of their legs. Within moments, the young couple morphed into bodybuilders!

Once the transformation ended, they just continued with their walk, without even wondering what had happened because their reality had changed. To them, they had always been bodybuilders!

So, Arnold sat down on the couch and started watching the sports channel on cable TV until…

Sudden she felt a tingling in her as her muscles swelled all around her body. But her uniform managed to stay in place.But she knew something was up so she flexed her biceps which swelled to 20 inches. Then she tried lifting the heaviest weight.on the machine. Next she tried some kickboxing to see how long she can do it. After 20 minutes of rapid kickboxing, she was simply bored. She smiled at her improvements and wished that she knew all of the martial arts in the world. In fact, she was 20 times as good as the second best one in it in each categories.
